hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT count(*) from com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO booking where booking.childConsgNumber = :consgNumber
SELECT booking.bookingChildCNId from com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO booking where booking.childConsgNumber = :consgNumber
From com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO childconsignment where childconsignment.dtToCentral='N' or childconsignment.dtToCentral is null
select childconsignment.consignment from com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO childconsignment where childconsignment.childConsgNumber IN (:childConsgNumber)

SELECT count(*) from com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO childCn where childCn.consignment is not null and length(childCn.childConsgNumber) =length(:startLeaf) AND childCn.childConsgNumber between :startLeaf and :endLeaf
select childconsignment.childConsgNumber from com.ff.domain.consignment.ChildConsignmentDO childconsignment inner join childconsignment.consignment as parentCn where parentCn.consgNo=:consgNo
